message.name: ERR_INTEGRATED_CASE_EMPTY
message.locale: Integrated Case Type cannot be empty.

message.name: ERR_MAX_INTEGRATED_CASE_TYPE_RECORDS
message.locale: The maximum allowed number of Integrated Case Types %1n is reached.

message.name: ERR_UNABLE_TO_GENERATE_INTEGRATED_CASE_TYPE_CODE
message.locale: Unable to generate unique integrated case type code for integrated case type %1s. Please try again!

message.name: ERR_INTEGRATED_CASE_TYPE_CODE_PREFIX_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The Integrated Case Type Code prefix %1s is too long. Maximum allowed is %2n characters.

message.name: ERR_UNABLE_TO_GENERATE_INTEGRATED_CASE_TYPE_CODE_TRY_AGAIN
message.locale: Unable to generate unique integrated case type code for integrated case type %1s. Please try again!

message.name: ERR_UNABLE_TO_GENERATE_INTEGRATED_CASE_TYPE_CODE_CRITICAL
message.locale: Unable to generate unique integrated case type code for integrated case type %1s. Please contact the Administrator!

message.name: LOG_MAX_GENERATED_INTEGRATED_CASE_TYPE_CODE
message.locale: The generated integrated case type code maximum %1n is reached.
